steps.title: Get started in three steps
steps.subtitle: Follow these quick onboarding steps to explore Evolution Hub without missing any essentials.

step1.title: Create your account
step1.description: Sign up for a free account and unlock your personal dashboard.
checklist: Have your invite or workspace link ready (optional)
Verify your email to ensure login continuity

step2.description: Choose the plan that fits your team – you can change it at any time.

Inform stakeholders about the selected plan

step3.title: Explore the tools
step3.description: Dive into our core tools and follow the step-by-step guides in the documentation.
checklist: Upload a sample image with Imag-Enhancer
Test a prompt with Prompt Enhancer
Run Voice Transcriptor or Webscraper in the sandbox

features.heading: AI tools for your daily workflows
features.subtitle: Explore our core tools for images, prompts, voice, web data, video and live web evaluation.

feature1.title: Imag‑Enhancer
feature1.description: Automatically enhances images: AI denoise, detail sharpening, high-quality upscaling, and color/contrast optimization.

feature2.title: Prompt Enhancer
feature2.description: AI-powered prompt optimizer for better results in AI chats and apps.

feature3.title: Voice Transcriptor
feature3.description: Record audio, visualize levels, and transcribe close to real time.

feature4.title: Webscraper
feature4.description: Extract clean text from websites securely. SSRF-hardened, format-aware, with usage limits and clear error messages.

feature5.title: Video‑Enhancer
feature5.description: Upscale and enhance videos with AI — sharper details, less noise, clearer frames.

feature6.title: Web‑Eval
feature6.description: Run structured evaluations against live websites – prompts, checks and reports in one place.

feature1.description: Turn noisy shadows into clear worlds.

feature2.description: Let words take flight and ideas grow.

feature4.description: Teach pages to speak in structure.

feature5.description: Where frames learn to breathe again.

feature6.description: Let the web stress-test your ideas.

testimonials.heading: How our tools can fit into real workflows
testimonials.subtitle: Short example notes that illustrate realistic ways to use our tools. These are scenarios, not customer reviews.
testimonials.trust_line: Example scenarios inspired by real creative and developer workflows

testimonial1.quote: I often shoot in cafés with low light — ISO 3200 is normal. Imag‑Enhancer removed the noise without that waxy look. A touch more contrast and the files were with the client that evening.
testimonial1.author: Amira K.

testimonial2.quote: We sell second‑hand goods. Phone photos on crumpled paper always looked busy. Batch denoise plus a bit of sharpening — suddenly everything feels consistent. Retouch time: from two days to one afternoon.
testimonial2.author: Diego R.

testimonial3.quote: We needed clean 4× crops for the homepage. The upscaler stayed free of halos and kept colors honest. It’s now a small, reliable step in our Figma→prod workflow.
testimonial3.author: Nina P.

testimonial4.quote: Clients send tiny JPEG logos five minutes before print. The upscaler delivers clean edges for A3 flyers — no stair‑stepping. We’re no longer chasing the “original file.”
testimonial4.author: Leila M.

testimonial5.quote: We pull stills from product videos for listings. Denoise + detail brings contours back and keeps text readable. That’s the difference between ‘meh’ and ‘sharp’.
testimonial5.author: Tom S.

introduction.part1: Evolution Hub offers an innovative collection of AI‑assisted tools built for developers and creatives. With our AI‑powered tools, you can streamline your workflow, automate repetitive tasks, and increase productivity. Whether you want to generate code, create content, or analyze complex data — our platform supports you at every step.
introduction.part2: The intelligent combination of artificial intelligence and user‑friendly design lets you unlock creativity and bring projects to life faster. Explore our powerful capabilities and learn how Evolution Hub helps shape the future of software development and content creation.
introduction.part3_de: Our advanced algorithms and user‑friendly interfaces work seamlessly to provide the best possible developer experience. From the first idea to the final implementation — Evolution Hub accompanies every step of your creative process.
introduction.part4_de: Use the power of AI to simplify complex tasks, build innovative solutions, and take your projects to the next level. With Evolution Hub, you help shape the future of digital development.

hero.subtitle: Discover AI‑powered tools to streamline your workflow and increase your productivity.
hero.subtitle_poetic: Where language turns into structure. Where data learns to dream.
hero.title_magnet: Your AI toolbox – with a free Prompt Enhancer in the Free plan.
hero.subtitle_magnet: Free plan with Prompt Enhancer included – up to 100 optimizations per day without touching your AI credits.
bullets: Free to use in the Free plan — no credit card required
Generous limits: up to 100 runs per day
Uses no AI credits — upgrade only when you need higher volume
typewriter_lines: Where small teams build big things.
hero.note: Free · No card required · Start instantly.
hero.trust_line: Built for teams who run real AI workflows every day.

dispute_resolution.headline: Dispute resolution
dispute_resolution.paragraph1: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
dispute_resolution.email_note: You can find our email address above in this legal notice.
dispute_resolution.participation_statement: We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

content_liability.headline: Liability for content
content_liability.paragraph1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages under general legislation pursuant to § 7 (1) TMG. Under §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third‑party information or to investigate circumstances indicating unlawful activity.
content_liability.paragraph2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general legislation remain unaffected. Liability in this respect is only possible from the time we become aware of a concrete infringement. As soon as we become aware of such infringements, we will remove this content immediately.

link_liability.headline: Liability for links
link_liability.paragraph1: Our offer contains links to external third‑party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking.
link_liability.paragraph2: However, permanent monitoring of the content of linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation. If we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

copyright.headline: Copyright
copyright.paragraph1: The content and works created by the website operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.
copyright.paragraph2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third‑party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of infringements, we will remove such content immediately.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.disclaimer_note: This English text is a convenience translation. The German version is legally binding.

1.title: 1. Controller
1.description: The controller within the meaning of the GDPR and other national data protection laws of the Member States as well as other data protection regulations is:

2.title: 2. General information on data processing
2.description: We process personal data of our users only insofar as this is necessary to provide a functional website as well as our content and services. The processing of our users' personal data regularly takes place only with the user's consent. An exception applies in those cases in which prior consent cannot be obtained for practical reasons and the processing of the data is permitted by legal provisions.

3.title: 3. Provision of the website and creation of log files
3.subtitle: Description and scope of data processing
3.paragraph1: Every time our website is accessed, our system automatically collects data and information from the computer system of the calling device.

4.title: 4. Cookies
4.description: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are text files that are stored in the internet browser or by the internet browser on the user's computer system. When a user visits a website, a cookie may be stored on the user's operating system. This cookie contains a characteristic string that enables the browser to be uniquely identified when the website is accessed again.

5.title: 5. Contact form and email contact
5.paragraph1: A contact form is available on our website which can be used for electronic contact. If a user takes advantage of this option, the data entered in the input mask is transmitted to us and stored.
5.paragraph2: Alternatively, it is possible to contact us via the email address provided. In this case, the user's personal data transmitted with the email will be stored.

list_items.0: request information about your personal data processed by us in accordance with Art. 15 GDPR
list_items.1: request the rectification of inaccurate or completion of your personal data stored by us without undue delay in accordance with Art. 16 GDPR
list_items.2: request the erasure of your personal data stored by us in accordance with Art. 17 GDPR
list_items.3: request the restriction of processing of your personal data in accordance with Art. 18 GDPR
list_items.4: receive your personal data that you have provided to us in a structured, commonly used and machine‑readable format in accordance with Art. 20 GDPR
list_items.5: withdraw consent once given to us at any time in accordance with Art. 7 (3) GDPR
list_items.6: lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority in accordance with Art. 77 GDPR

7.title: 7. Right to object
7.description: You have the right, on grounds relating to your particular situation, to object at any time to processing of personal data concerning you which is based on Article 6 (1) (e) or (f) GDPR.

8.title: 8. Data security
8.description: We use the common SSL (Secure Socket Layer) method during your website visit in conjunction with the highest level of encryption supported by your browser. This is usually 256‑bit encryption. If your browser does not support 256‑bit encryption, we use 128‑bit v3 technology instead.

9.title: 9. Currency and changes to this privacy policy
9.description: This privacy policy is currently valid and is up to date as of July 2025. Due to the further development of our website and offers or due to changed legal or official requirements, it may become necessary to change this privacy policy.

credits_packs.title: Buy extra credits
credits_packs.subtitle: One-time packs to top up your monthly allowance.

100.title: Starter pack
100.description: Perfect if you're just a few runs short.
bullets: Usable for all tools – no plan change required

500.title: Creator pack
500.description: Ideal for weekly projects and team workflows.
bullets: Helps you stay within daily burst limits

1500.title: Pro pack
1500.description: Best value for agencies and production teams.

credits_explainer.title: What are credits?
credits_explainer.intro: Credits are a unified allowance you can use across all tools. Each operation consumes credits; higher plans include more credits and higher daily burst limits.

bullets.0: Use credits in tools like Imag‑Enhancer, Video Enhancer, Prompt Enhancer and Voice Transcriptor.
bullets.1: Your monthly credits reset every billing cycle; daily burst limits help ensure service quality.
bullets.2: Need more? Buy one-time credit packs anytime (100/500/1500).

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.question1: Can I change my plan later?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can switch plans at any time. The change takes effect with your next billing cycle.
faq.question2: Is there a minimum contract term?
faq.answer2: No, all plans can be cancelled monthly. There is no long-term commitment.
faq.question3: Can I try the Enterprise plan?
faq.answer3: Yes — contact us for an individual demo and a trial period for Enterprise features.

1.title: Scope
1.content: These terms govern the use of Evolution Hub services and apply to all agreements concluded with Evolution Hub GmbH.

2.title: Conclusion of contract
2.content: A contract is concluded when you complete registration or accept these terms in another way, for example by using the service after being notified of these terms.

3.title: Services
3.content: We provide a cloud-based platform and related features. The scope of services depends on the selected plan and the documentation in effect at the time the contract is concluded.

4.title: Accounts and security
4.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your access credentials and for all activities in your account. Please inform us immediately of any unauthorized use.

5.title: Pricing and payment
5.content: Fees, billing cycles, and payment methods are listed on the pricing page. All prices are in EUR unless stated otherwise. Applicable taxes may apply.

6.title: Term and cancellation
6.content: Contracts are concluded for an indefinite period and can be cancelled at the end of the current billing period. The right to terminate for cause without notice remains unaffected.

7.title: Permitted use
7.content: You must not misuse the service, interfere with its operation, or violate applicable law. Automated scraping, reverse engineering, or security testing without permission is prohibited.

8.title: Warranty and liability
8.content: The service is provided within the scope of the selected plan. Our liability is limited to intent and gross negligence unless mandatory law provides otherwise.

9.title: Intellectual property
9.content: All intellectual property rights in the service remain with Evolution Hub or its licensors. You receive a non-exclusive, non-transferable right of use for the duration of the contract.

10.title: Privacy
10.content: We process personal data in accordance with our privacy policy. Details on purposes and legal bases can be found in our privacy policy.

11.title: Governing law and jurisdiction
11.content: German law applies, excluding its conflict-of-law rules. The place of jurisdiction is Berlin to the extent permitted by law.

12.title: Changes to these terms
12.content: We may update these terms to reflect changes in legal requirements or our services. Material changes will be communicated in advance. Continued use is considered acceptance.

11_participation.title: Participation in dispute resolution
11_participation.content: We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

step1.title: 1. Input prompt
step1.subtitle: Choose a preset or write your own prompt. You can edit the text freely afterward.

step2.title: 2. Additional context (optional)
step2.subtitle: Add files or text sources to help the AI understand your request better.
step2.help: TXT and Markdown URLs are imported as text files and used as context during enhancement.

step3.title: 3. Output style
step3.subtitle: Choose how detailed and formal the enhanced prompt should be.

files.label: Files (optional)
files.dropHint: Drop files here or click to select

error.rateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
error.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.

form.modeMapping: Creative – more exploratory and detailed · Professional – structured and business-focused · Concise – short and to the point

usage.title: Usage
usage.freeMessage: Up to 100 high-quality prompt improvements per day on the Free plan.

improvements.title: What was improved?
improvements.structure: Added structure (e.g., clear sections and headings).
improvements.constraints: Added constraints and rules to make the outcome more predictable.
improvements.steps: Added step-by-step instructions for the model.

codingBugfix.label: Coding / Bugfix
codingBugfix.description: Starter prompt for debugging and refactoring code.
codingBugfix.template: Help me find bugs in the following code and propose clean, idiomatic fixes. Briefly explain why each bug is problematic, and show improved code snippets.

dataAnalysis.label: Data / Analytics
dataAnalysis.description: Starter prompt for analyzing KPIs, reports, and datasets.
dataAnalysis.template: Help me analyze a data excerpt (KPIs, events, tables). Identify patterns, outliers, and hypotheses and suggest concrete next analysis steps.

contentLinkedin.label: Content / LinkedIn
contentLinkedin.description: Starter prompt for LinkedIn posts about AI & productivity.
contentLinkedin.template: Create LinkedIn posts about an AI topic for knowledge workers. Focus on clear examples, real use cases, and a clear value proposition in the first paragraph.

researchAudience.label: Research / Audience
researchAudience.description: Starter prompt for audience interviews and surveys.
researchAudience.template: Help me understand my target audience better. Create interview and survey questions to capture needs, pain points, current solutions, and decision-making processes.

privacy.heading: Privacy & processing
privacy.text: Imag-Enhancer can run on our servers or locally (depending on the integration). For sensitive data, consider local processing; contact us for self-hosting options.

workflow.heading: Example workflow

Choose a preset or adjust settings manually.
Review the preview and select a quality level.
Process a single image or start batch processing.

Imag-Enhancer.longDescription: Imag-Enhancer uses modern neural models to automatically improve photos and graphics. Choose presets or fine-tune denoising, sharpening, color correction, and upscaling. Supports single images and batch processing, with optional local processing for privacy-sensitive workflows.

privacy.heading: Privacy & processing
privacy.text: Prompts are processed on our servers. Please do not enter sensitive or personal data.

Prompt-Enhancer.longDescription: Prompt-Enhancer refines your prompts for clarity, tone, and completeness. Choose a style and get a better, safer prompt for your AI tools.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions

items.question: What is Evolution Hub?
items.answer: Evolution Hub is a platform for modern web development focused on performance, usability, and modern technologies.

items.question: Which technologies do you use?
items.answer: We use Astro for the frontend, TypeScript for type-safe development, and Tailwind CSS for styling. Our backend is built on modern JavaScript/TypeScript technologies.

items.question: Do I need an account?
items.answer: You need an account for most features. Some areas such as documentation and blog posts are also accessible without an account.

items.question: How do you handle privacy?
items.answer: We take privacy and security seriously. All data is transmitted in encrypted form and processed in accordance with GDPR.

items.question: When is support available?
items.answer: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm.

items.question: Is Evolution Hub mobile-friendly?
items.answer: Yes, our platform is optimized for mobile devices and can be used on smartphones and tablets.

items.question: Is the platform accessible?
items.answer: We continuously work to improve accessibility so that the platform is usable for everyone.

items.question: How do referrals work?
items.answer: Share your personal referral link from the dashboard. Once someone signs up through it and verifies their access, you receive bonus credits. If the referral later upgrades to a paid plan, additional credits are granted.

items.question: How do I create an account?
items.answer: Click "Register" in the top navigation and follow the instructions. You’ll need a valid email address.

items.question: How can I reset my password?
items.answer: On the login page, you’ll find a "Forgot password" link. Enter your email address and follow the instructions in the email you receive.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Go to your account settings and choose "Manage subscription". There you can cancel your subscription.

items.question: Which subscription plans are available?
items.answer: We offer different plans tailored to different needs. You can find details on our pricing page.

items.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and SEPA direct debit.

items.question: How can I recover my account if I lose access?
items.answer: Use the password reset flow or contact our support team for further help.

items.question: How do I manage notification settings?
items.answer: In your account settings you can configure which notifications you want to receive.

items.question: Which browsers are supported?
items.answer: We support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Older browsers may not be fully supported.

items.question: How can I use the API?
items.answer: You can find our API documentation at /api-docs. You’ll need an API key, which you can generate in your account settings.

items.question: How do I report a bug?
items.answer: Please use our bug report form at /kontakt or create an issue in our GitHub repository.

items.question: Are there usage limits for the API?
items.answer: Yes, our API has usage limits to ensure fair distribution of resources. Details are available in the API documentation.

items.question: Can I integrate Evolution Hub with third-party tools?
items.answer: Yes, we offer integrations and webhooks for various third-party services.

items.question: What are the system requirements?
items.answer: We recommend using a modern browser and a stable internet connection.

items.question: Are there backup and recovery options?
items.answer: Yes, your data is backed up regularly and can be restored if needed.

cooldown.one: You updated your profile recently. You can update it again in 1 day.
cooldown.other: You updated your profile recently. You can update it again in {count} days.
